description:
11.78 drawtext
Draw a text string or text from a specified file on top of a video, using the
libfreetype library.

To enable compilation of this filter, you need to configure FFmpeg with
--enable-libfreetype and --enable-libharfbuzz.
To enable default font fallback and the font option you need to
configure FFmpeg with --enable-libfontconfig.
To enable the text_shaping option, you need to configure FFmpeg with
--enable-libfribidi.
name: drawtext
source:
11.78 drawtext

Draw a text string or text from a specified file on top of a video, using the libfreetype library.

To enable compilation of this filter, you need to configure FFmpeg with --enable-libfreetype and --enable-libharfbuzz. To enable default font fallback and the font option you need to configure FFmpeg with --enable-libfontconfig. To enable the text_shaping option, you need to configure FFmpeg with --enable-libfribidi.
